page.title: 04Education-Playground Games
page.content: The favourite game for both boys and girls is "Bulldogs".To play Bulldogs someone is "IT" and the others have to run across the playground without being touched by the person who is "IT".They run when "IT" shouts "Bulldogs".If they are touched by the "IT" then they have to help the person who is "IT".Whoever is first caught is "IT" in the next game .This is a dangerous game and there have been many incidents when children have been hurt,so it is banned by most teachers. Among older children ball games are usually played during "breaks" or at lunch time. These include Football, Non-stop Cricket, Rounders and Tennis played with the hands. Young children prefer Hop-Scotch, "IT on the line", Piggy-in-the-Middle and chasing games. Girls prefer to play Elastic Skipping .
